The incident occurred on a foot overbridge, causing a chain reaction of falling passengers. Indian Railways has disbursed ₹2 crore in compensation to victims and families.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/big-headload-falling-from-a-passenger-led-to-new-delhi-railway-station-stampede/articleshow/123054519.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/big-headload-falling-from-a-passenger-led-to-new-delhi-railway-station-stampede/articleshow/123054519.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 07:08:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="68560" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054554,imgsize-68560.cms"/></item><item><title>Who is backing Palestine? From Canada to France, countries recognising its statehood</title><description><![CDATA[In a significant diplomatic move, key US allies like France, Britain, and Canada are preparing to recognize Palestine as a sovereign state, increasing global pressure on Israel. This shift follows growing international frustration over the Gaza conflict, with France aiming for recognition by September.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/who-is-backing-palestine-from-nato-to-un-countries-recognising-its-statehood-what-is-indias-stance/articleshow/123054841.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/who-is-backing-palestine-from-nato-to-un-countries-recognising-its-statehood-what-is-indias-stance/articleshow/123054841.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 08:49:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1123860" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123055139,imgsize-1123860.cms"/></item><item><title>Has India stopped buying Russian oil? Trump reacts to reports, calls it 'good step'</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump claimed India halted Russian oil imports, calling it a "good step," despite earlier threats of tariffs for continued trade with Russia. He also suggested Pakistan might one day sell oil to India. India's MEA firmly rejected Trump's remarks, asserting the "steady and time-tested partnership" with Russia stands independently and shouldn't be viewed through a third country's lens.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/heard-india-not-going-to-buy-russian-oil-donald-trump-calls-it-good-step-watch/articleshow/123053210.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/heard-india-not-going-to-buy-russian-oil-donald-trump-calls-it-good-step-watch/articleshow/123053210.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 05:35:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1029173" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123053327,imgsize-1029173.cms"/></item><item><title>Man slapped during 'panic attack' on IndiGo flight goes missing</title><description><![CDATA[A young man from Assam went missing after being slapped on an IndiGo flight from Mumbai to Kolkata, sparking outrage. The action was based on specific intelligence inputs about the presence of terrorists in the area, a police official told news agency PTI.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/operation-akhal-one-terrorist-killed-in-jks-kulgam-joint-operation-by-police-army-and-crpf-under-way/articleshow/123054798.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/operation-akhal-one-terrorist-killed-in-jks-kulgam-joint-operation-by-police-army-and-crpf-under-way/articleshow/123054798.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 08:14:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1192703" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054840,imgsize-1192703.cms"/></item><item><title>How Amazon's 'AI mistake' is lesson for every eng using Gen-AI for coding</title><description><![CDATA[An Amazon Gen-AI coding tool, Q Developer, faced a security breach where a hacker infiltrated it with malicious code disguised as a legitimate update. This allowed the hacker to instruct the tool to delete files from users' computers. The incident highlights vulnerabilities in AI-driven software development, as many organizations using AI for coding do so in risky ways.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/how-amazons-ai-mistake-is-a-basic-lesson-for-every-engineer-using-gen-ai-for-coding/articleshow/123028573.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/how-amazons-ai-mistake-is-a-basic-lesson-for-every-engineer-using-gen-ai-for-coding/articleshow/123028573.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 00:07:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="136524" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123028576,imgsize-136524.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Drama! England's Pope refuses umpire's spin option, forces early stumps</title><description><![CDATA[Ollie Pope's surprising refusal to bowl spin under fading light led to an early stumps call on Day 2 of the fifth Test. Despite India's aggressive fightback and a slender lead, Pope's decision to halt play sparked debate, with England potentially sacrificing momentum. The day saw 15 wickets fall and India ending with a 52-run lead.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/watch-drama-england-skipper-ollie-pope-refuses-umpires-spin-option-forces-early-stumps-on-day-2-of-final-test/articleshow/123054548.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/watch-drama-england-skipper-ollie-pope-refuses-umpires-spin-option-forces-early-stumps-on-day-2-of-final-test/articleshow/123054548.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 07:24:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50394" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054599,imgsize-50394.cms"/></item><item><title>Toddler survives 18-storey fall; father honours tree with red flower</title><description><![CDATA[In a miraculous turn of events, a three-year-old boy in China survived an 18-storey fall after a tree broke his descent. After waking up, the child fell from an unprotected bathroom window.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/china/ask-daddy-for-a-bumblebee-toddler-after-surviving-18-storey-fall-father-honours-tree-with-red-flower/articleshow/123054672.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/china/ask-daddy-for-a-bumblebee-toddler-after-surviving-18-storey-fall-father-honours-tree-with-red-flower/articleshow/123054672.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 08:23:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="180109" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054987,imgsize-180109.cms"/></item><item><title>Heated confrontation! This confrontation punctuated a day of high drama, featuring 15 wickets and earlier exchanges between Joe Root and Prasidh Krishna. Despite the on-field intensity, India ended the day at 75/2, leading by 52 runs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/heated-confrontation-sai-sudharsan-ben-duckett-in-tense-face-off-during-ind-vs-eng-5th-test-watch/articleshow/123054656.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/heated-confrontation-sai-sudharsan-ben-duckett-in-tense-face-off-during-ind-vs-eng-5th-test-watch/articleshow/123054656.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 07:48:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23344" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054725,imgsize-23344.cms"/></item><item><title>Google CEO Sundar Pichai to employees: ‘I think we have to accomplish more…’</title><description><![CDATA[Google's CEO Sundar Pichai and executives like Brian Saluzzo are urging employees to accelerate the integration of AI into their workflows, aiming for increased productivity and efficiency. The inclusion of chess in the Esports World Cup marks a significant step in modernizing the game.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/new-ground-conquered-world-no-1-magnus-carlsen-after-winning-inaugural-esports-chess-world-cup-title/articleshow/123055171.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/new-ground-conquered-world-no-1-magnus-carlsen-after-winning-inaugural-esports-chess-world-cup-title/articleshow/123055171.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 09:02:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44214" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123055258,imgsize-44214.cms"/></item><item><title>J&K landslide: SDM Rajinder Singh Rana, son dead in Reasi</title><description><![CDATA[A tragic landslide in Jammu and Kashmir's Reasi district claimed the lives of Rajinder Singh, a sub-divisional magistrate, and his son. Six others were injured and are receiving treatment at District Hospital Reasi, prompting condolences from the Lieutenant Governor's office.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/srinagar/jk-landslide-sdm-rajinder-singh-rana-son-dead-in-reasi-several-injured/articleshow/123054364.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/srinagar/jk-landslide-sdm-rajinder-singh-rana-son-dead-in-reasi-several-injured/articleshow/123054364.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 07:04:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49198" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054433,imgsize-49198.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Historic!       <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
